name: TWINS (NirajArts)
description:
Twins, as the game name, reflects how the game is.

Two twin circles (but one is a bit different from the other), are connected by an invisible bond. throughout their endless journey, they face many different obstacles, if one of them hit the obstacles he will die and the other will fall down. 

There are also the Red Enemies. they might fall from the sky anytime. So be careful and keep moving to possibly avoid them. if they touch you you'll die. And if they go through the gap between the TWINS the BOND between them will be BROKEN and both will fall down!

Related Links

Stream Game Music: Tinct - Theme
